column1: * 1973 – J.R.R. Tolkien takes a holiday to Bournemouth.
* 2004 - The Tolkien Societys Tolkien Weekend in Sarehole Mill
* 2007 - The Deluxe Edition of The Children of Húrin is published.
* 2010 - The Tolkien Societys Middle-earth Weekend in Sarehole Mill
